<!--*Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the

1. Title the issue "Installation issue: libgit2, rust".
2. Provide the information required below.

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively!
-->


### Spack version
<!-- Add the output to the command below -->
```console
$ spack --version
0.14.1-524-dd7a413f4

```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install rust
```
Then we try to build a package that depends on rust lets say, bat, I discovered this since I am adding exa after I pull request a fix for this
```console
$ spack install bat
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status -6:
    '/Users/dsmc/Documents/Projects/spack/opt/spack/darwin-catalina-x86_64/clang-11.0.3-apple/rust-1.42.0-bstzydu5kantx3k4npotzo5mqqw3fafw/bin/cargo' 'install' '--root' '/Users/dsmc/Documents/Projects/spack/opt/spack/darwin-catalina-x86_64/clang-11.0.3-apple/bat-0.12.1-s5i5r54odl3npgdn3xdt4cuv56lgk77h' '--path' '.'

So then we can do a cat to the file that contains the error and we see this:
```console
3xdt4cuv56lgk77h/spack-build-out.txt
==> 33175: bat: Executing phase: 'install'
==> [2020-04-05-20:10:12.346754, 33188] '/Users/dsmc/Documents/Projects/spack/opt/spack/darwin-catalina-x86_64/clang-11.0.3-apple/rust-1.42.0-bstzydu5kantx3k4npotzo5mqqw3fafw/bin/cargo' 'install' '--root' '/Users/dsmc/Documents/Projects/spack/opt/spack/darwin-catalina-x86_64/clang-11.0.3-apple/bat-0.12.1-s5i5r54odl3npgdn3xdt4cuv56lgk77h' '--path' '.'

$ uname -a

### Additional information

Well we can fix this error by using otool to change the dylib paths, as seen in the following example:

```console
install_name_tool -change libssh2.1.dylib /Users/dsmc/Documents/Projects/spack/opt/spack/darwin-catalina-x86_64/clang-11.0.3-apple/libssh2-1.8.0-bwme3nb5vpustesfddxwqbevjk5zm2gd/lib/libssh2.1.0.1.dylib  /Users/dsmc/Documents/Projects/spack/opt/spack/darwin-catalina-x86_64/clang-11.0.3-apple/libgit2-1.0.0-sdlgezlhpbkjm37oiortjy5d3yxqx56p/lib/libgit2.1.0.0.dylib
```

I will be pushing a pull request to fix this issue, just addressing it so I can reference it.


### General information

- [x] I have run `spack --version` and reported the version of Spack
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Rust and libgit don't link against libssh 2 on Darwin
